item.title: I3 dev setup on Ubuntu 18.04
item.description: Just a note to self, nothing interesting 1. Install LVM on LUKS Follow instructions here 2. Setup dropbox No support for filesystems other than ext4. No support for eCryptfs on ext4. 3. Install and mount gocryptfs volume Keep versions in sync, just in case https://github.com/rfjakob/gocryptfs/releases 4. Generate ssh keys Store passphrase in synced password store ssh-keygen Use the cryptfs volume to transfer the pub keys, then add them to github, bitbucket.
